Description: RARE+++ Stunning CYMA Gents Swiss Oversized Mechanical wristwatch *SERVICED* ***NO RESERVED PRICE*** Dear customers, we present for sale this pre-owned gorgeous mega rare Swiss Cyma Oversized wristwatch. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! If you have been collecting watches for a while, I think you’re going to appreciate the following sophisticated antique timepiece that is hard to find nowadays. This watch is prized for reliability, convenience in use, and meets relatively seldom. A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! MOVEMENT : This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the original pocket watch, magic movement '' CYMA ''. In an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Smooth and strong running of the balance. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time!!! Signed : '' CYMA ''. See the photos for more details!!! CASE : This astonishing timepiece has excellent preserved Oversized chrome/nickel case. Professionally polished, it's literally like a mirror. No signs of any serious damages of time or use. The case has crown for winding and setting at 12 o'clock position. The watch supplied with a brand new Genuine leather strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. For more photos to the case see photos below the whole description! The large winding crown is in very good shape and operates properly! Diameter watch without the crown: 42 mm. Diameter watch with the crown and both lugs: : 52 mm. Thickness watch: 10,5 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! DIAL : This amazing timepiece has gorgeous white, porcelain, enamel dial. Absolutely original! In excellent condition, only have one hairline. The dial has black Arabic numerals and sub dial at 6 o'clock position. Signed : '' CYMA ''. The plastic dome crystal is changed with brand new, because old one was in very worse condition! See the photos for more details!!! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED!
